title: How about a Dark Star Diana skin?
body:
I think that Diana deserves a Dark Star skin. I mean... why Infernal and no Dark Star? I think that Dark Star is more close to a heretic like Diana... 
Also: Infernal = Sun
         Dark Star = (close at least) Moon

replies.body:
The Infernal Diana skin was a result of Team Fire winning All-Stars 2015 and Diana winning the vote for who should receive the skin (Nautilus, Teemo or Diana).
Back on topic, I think Diana would look awesome with a Dark Star skin!

Ah yeah, Infernal came out of voting from All Stars. Dark Star is a cool idea for her (imagine that E!). 
Diana lends herself well to a lot of thematics, so many possibilities :O
Though that begs the question why she gets new skins so rarely *wink wink nudge nudge*
its probably due to them making the model and all that and getting ingame and it just looking bad. a lot of skins don't make it past the inital testing it seems.

So, not only brooding Male Champs can get Dark Star skins?

And here I was hoping for Dark star Mordekaiser and Vladimir.
I would personally enjoy a Dark Star {{champion:6}} to exact his revenge against the Star Guardians.
But Urgot IS THE FIRST STAR!
Neon Strike and Cosmic Reaver please!
Dark Star Diana never even crossed my mind, I was always on the Blood moon hype but this sounds just as good if not better
THEN DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT RIOT
Are any of these possibilities going to come out the next season?{{sticker:cass-cry}}
Infernal teemo, LMFAOOOOOOOOOOO!
http://33.media.tumblr.com/512af2bed7d73247c6b5ef467256d8e8/tumblr_niodwgKp1u1tq4of6o1_500.gif

Hrm... Who should get the next BLOODMOON skin?
Do we have any characters that are closely related to the moo- OMG HOW ABOUT JHIN?!
-Watches Diana go cry in a corner-

While I like the idea of Dark Star Diana, I think I would prefer to see a Dark Star Soraka first. =P

Riot: New bloodmoon skins guys, who should get them?
{{champion:238}} I would like one.
{{champion:64}} As would i.
{{champion:8}} Blood moon? That sounds pretty nice...
{{champion:89}} Eh, i'll pass.
{{champion:131}} Eh em.
Riot: We have some takers!
{{champion:131}} *Whispers to herself* *plzplzplz.*
{{champion:92}} GIVE ME ONE!!!!11111
{{champion:157}} FUCK YOU GUYS I TOTALLY NEED ANOTHER ONE!!!!
{{champion:67}} NO FUCK YOU IT'S MINE!
Riot: AND THE WINNER IS:
{{champion:131}} *Whipsers to herself come on come on*
{{champion:92}} FUUUUCK YOOOOOOOOOOU!
{{champion:157}} I DESERVE IT WAY MORE THAN ANYBODY ELSE
{{champion:67}} ELO BOOSTED TRASH
Riot: {{champion:6}} !
{{champion:131}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
{{champion:92}} ***AFKs***
{{champion:67}} ***Starts Feeding***
Riot: Here at Riot we genuinely believe that Urgot was the best decision for the new Blood Moon skin! He fits the theme so perfectly and no other champion could possibly fit the theme as well as Urgot does!

Well, with the exception of {{champion:26}}, each champ who has gotten a Bloodmoon skin has fit the thematic quite well. 

I know this is a joke (and I think its awesome), I'm just making a point.
Bet we'll get Bloodmoon {{champion:89}} and {{champion:136}} before bloodmoon diana :p
... huh. Bloodmoon Aurelion Sol would actually look pretty badass...
Well Pretty much every champ would look badass with a blood moon skin

Eh... not all of them would look right w/one, but yeah.

Aurelion Sol in particular has the face for it tho
I've always thought the best candidate for a new dark star skin was Xerath

> [{quoted}](name=DimirWaterbender,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=aMPROaiA,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-12-14T03:07:50.590+0000)
>
> I've always thought the best candidate for a new dark star skin was Xerath

You are da real mvp
Well since we do get dark star poros,it is reasonable to assume that the dark star skins were quite the hit,meaning that we'll likely see more of them next year.
the obvious candidate for a dark star is {{champion:56}}  he fits the theme better then anyone in the entire league

HOW ABOUT A BLOOD MOON DIANA RIOT?

SHES THE MOON BUT YOU GAVE IT TO THE NINJAS
What about Dark Valkeryie Diana?
Fuck Dark start Diana,imagine Dark Star aurelgiok sol
Isn't Dark Valkyrie the less fancy version of that?

To be honest, Diana just needs more skins in general.

I for one would LOVE to see Blood Moon Diana as a legendary........that would be badass!
I imagine her E would be really interesting if they go with a Dark Star skin
